desc: Brought to you by One Believer LTD. (b2yb1B) is an Urban Christian brand that boldly expresses the simplicity of the CHRISTian Faith and Lifestyle...for the on-the-go Believer, who practices operating in His rest, receiving His love, and spreading His message…who ultimately understand the finished work of Jesus!

layout.text: STYLE IS A WAY TO SAY WHO YOU ARE WITHOUT HAVING TO SPEAK
